product_name: Royal Robbins Nellie Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Certified organic cotton makes the Royal Robbins Nellie Tank Top feel soft and breathable, and ensures you feel good. 100% organic cotton is breathable and easy care, and is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Pleated front inset with gathers and an open notch at center back provide eye-catching style. The women's Royal Robbins Nellie Tank Top is garment washed for softness. Closeout.
short_description: Certified organic cotton makes the Royal Robbins Nellie Tank Top feel soft and breathable, and ensures you feel good.
